timeline.bodyText: Why it using lro regry duration?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: The cosmos multi location prevision is async. It will return succeeded when first location is done. This func I think is to ensure all location is succeeded.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: Yes, but why use getLroRetryDuration? It should be only used for LRO, but this is not.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: You can use getDelayDuration with a specified delay.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: This is a LRO situation, just isn't a common LRO situation.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: Long running operation to wait all location prevision complete.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
weidongxu-microsoft
weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: feat: change lro retry duration to delay duration
